author: mightypenguin
content:
One of the nice (if not THE nice part) of EIP1559 is predictable gas costs. I'm curious how predictable gas costs would be for "warming up" old state.
Would there be a constant "warmup" cost or would it be an increment of the cold period?
e.g. With a cold period of 1 month.
So if I need state from 6 months ago I pay 6x the warmup gas price?
So the older state becomes the more expensive to use it? That would mean that eventually we would have a lot of expensive to use, effectively orphaned state.
That would probably remove some use cases for ethereum.
